_comment_Conversation_Length: Due to model token lengths, this is set to a lower number to fit more long term memories
_comment_memory_mode: The available memory modes are: Forced, Auto, Manual, and Training
_comment_Vision_Model: For discord bot, use 'eyes_url'. For the Ui, use 'eyes'.
_comment_Model_Backend: The available Model Backends are: Llama_2_Chat, Alpaca, Vicuna, ChatML, and OpenAi.
_comment_LLM_Model: The available LLM Models are: Oobabooga_Llama_2, AetherNode, Open_Ai_GPT_35, and Open_Ai_GPT_4.  AetherNode will take the model from Model_Backend.
_comment_API: The available API's are: Oobabooga, AetherNode, OpenAi
_comment_HOST_AetherNode: To use multiple hosts, separate them with a space.  First host should be the fastest.  Second Host will be used for memories.  Additional hosts will be used for Agent Mode.
_comment_HOST_Oobabooga: To use multiple hosts, separate them with a space.  First host should be the fastest.  Second Host will be used for memories.  Additional hosts will be used for Agent Mode.
_comment_Embeddings: The available embedding methods are: Embeddings_Sentence_Xformer
_comment_TTS: The available TTS methods are: gTTS, coquiai
UI_SETTINGS: The settings below are only for the user interface.
_comment_Bot_Name: Bot Name to use for the Aetherius Ui
_comment_Username: Username to use for the Aetherius Ui
